description: Smartwool's Hike Full Cushion Crew socks, formerly PhD® Outdoor, use cushioning on the entire sock to help maximize warmth and protection. These responsibly sourced, ZQ-certified Merino wool hike socks are built with their top sock tech, including Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, their 4 Degree™ Elite Fit System for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit, and their Virtually Seamless™ toe for maximum in-shoe/boot comfort. We've updated their hike line by improving mesh zones for additional breathability, as well as creating a new ply structure that reduces pilling while enhancing hand-feel and comfort. Not to mention, their best-feeling, best-fitting hiking socks are now made with recycled nylon—making these socks more sustainable than ever. Now that's something you can feel good in and about.
name: Smartwool Hike Full Cushion Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 62% Merino Wool, 24% Recycled Nylon, 12% Nylon, 2% Elastane
